#SETUP: disable:NumberIsFloat

>> Sequence(3,2e28,2e28)
Table({Value:20000000000000000000000000000},{Value:40000000000000000000000000000},{Value:60000000000000000000000000000})

>> Sequence(5,2e28,2e28)
Table({Value:20000000000000000000000000000},{Value:40000000000000000000000000000},{Value:60000000000000000000000000000},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})})

>> Sequence(4,-1e28,-1e28)
Table({Value:-10000000000000000000000000000},{Value:-20000000000000000000000000000},{Value:-30000000000000000000000000000},{Value:-40000000000000000000000000000})

>> Sequence(5,-3e28,-3e28)
Table({Value:-30000000000000000000000000000},{Value:-60000000000000000000000000000},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})})
